'''''Tabletop Adventurer''''' is an [[Event Quest]] during the [[Mega Meka Melee]] Event.

==Steps==
# Talk to Armand, the staff member

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Armand of Lepaute Horlogerie is in charge of taking care of their toys. Go see how you can try those gizmos out...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Armand)
:'''Armand:''' H&mdash;H&mdash;Hello, you t&mdash;two... My name is... is... A&mdash;A&mdash;Armand...
:'''Paimon:''' You seem kinda nervous...
:'''Armand:''' S&mdash;S&mdash;Sorry! I&mdash;I get like th&mdash;this when th&mdash;there are too many... p&mdash;p&mdash;people around...
:'''Paimon:''' No worries, no worries. You don't have to rush, we're just here to try out the toy!
:'''Armand:''' O&mdash;Oh. S&mdash;S&mdash;Sure... I have p&mdash;prepared a... h&mdash;h&mdash;handbook for you...
:'''Paimon:''' Aw, that's so nice of you, Armand! We'll read it carefully for sure.
:'''Armand:''' I&mdash;It's alright if you d&mdash;don't read it. It's very s&mdash;s&mdash;simple and f&mdash;fun... D&mdash;Do you want to t&mdash;try?
:{{DIcon}} Thanks, I'll give it a go.
:'''Armand:''' I h&mdash;h&mdash;hope you... enjoy yourselves.
{{Dialogue End}}
